author: Steven Shepard
title: Poll: Don’t stop social distancing if coronavirus will spread
description: Only 10 percent of voters surveyed in a POLITICO/Morning Consult poll support ending social distancing to stimulate the economy.
content: More than eight in 10 voters, 81 percent, say Americans should continue to social distance for as long as is needed to curb the spread of coronavirus, even if it means continued damage to the economy. Only 10 percent say Americans should stop social distancin… [+3736 chars]
